document.full_text: the u.s. supreme court ruled on thursday against microsoft corp in its appeal of a record $290 million jury verdict for infringing a small canadian software firm's patent.
document.title: microsoft loses supreme court case on i4i patent
lines_and_colors: the u.s. supreme court ruled on thursday against microsoft corp in its appeal of a record $290 million jury verdict for infringing a small canadian software firm's patent.
